means: 保证，许诺，发誓( pledge的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Mr Dudley has pledged to give any award to charity.
sentence.Network_cn: 达德利先生已承诺将任何所获的损害赔偿额都捐给慈善机构。

sentence.Network_en: The UN pledged to help supervise the clearance of mines.
sentence.Network_cn: 联合国承诺协助监督扫雷工作。

sentence.Network_en: The government has pledged to give the promotion of democracy higher priority.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府已经保证把促进民主摆在更重要的位置。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Pledge loyalty to a nation ; pledged their cooperation ., 向国家许诺忠心 ; 许诺他们的合作.
Mr. Obama pledged more conversation with Russia about the issue of missile defense ., 奥巴马承诺将就导弹防御问题与俄罗斯进行更多磋商.
Everyone at the table stop up and pledged the bride and bridegroom ., 在座的每个人起立举杯祝新娘和新郎健康.
But Intel immediately pledged appeal the decision , denying its practices had violated European law ., 不过 , 英特尔立即表示将就此决定提起上诉 , 否认其做法违反了欧洲法律.

list.abs: 希高翻译... ... thin-walled box beam 薄壁箱形梁 thing pledged 担保物 things confiscated 被没收的物品.
字_百度百科 ... ◎ 字句[ words and expressions] ◎ 字据[ written pledge] ◎ 字块[ block].
会计词汇D ... physical assets 实物资产 pledged assets 抵押资产 productive assets 生产性资产.
土地词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... perform 履行 performance pledge 服务承诺 peri-urban area 市区外围地带.

entry.def: When someone makes a pledge, they make a serious promise that they will do something.

example.ex: The meeting ended with a pledge to step up cooperation between the six states of the region.
example.tran: 会议以承诺加快这一地区六国间的合作而结束。

example.ex: ...a £1.1m pledge of support from the Spanish ministry of culture.
example.tran: 来自西班牙文化部110万英镑的资助许诺

entry.tran: 保证，许诺，发誓（做）；保证给予
entry.def: When someone pledges to do something, they promise in a serious way to do it. When they pledge something, they promise to give it.

example.ex: Mr Dudley has pledged to give any award to charity...
example.tran: 达德利先生已承诺将任何所获的损害赔偿额都捐给慈善机构。

example.ex: Philip pledges support and offers to help in any way that he can...
example.tran: 菲利普保证给予支持，并主动提出尽其所能提供帮助。

entry.def: If you pledge a sum of money to an organization or activity, you promise to pay that amount of money to it at a particular time or over a particular period.

example.ex: The French President is pledging $150 million in French aid next year...
example.tran: 法国总统许诺为法国明年的援助经费拨款1.5亿美元。

example.ex: The government has now pledged £170m over the next six years for improving primary care.
example.tran: 为了改善初级卫生保健工作，政府已承诺在未来6年内拨款1.7亿英镑。

entry.tran: 使保证，使许诺，使发誓（遵循或支持）
entry.def: If you pledge yourself to something, you commit yourself to following a particular course of action or to supporting a particular person, group, or idea.

example.ex: The President pledged himself to increase taxes for the rich but not the middle classes...
example.tran: 总统保证增加对富人而非中产阶级的税收。

example.ex: Tony Cottee has pledged himself to Everton Football Club for another three years...
example.tran: 托尼·科蒂已答应同埃弗顿足球俱乐部再续约3年。

entry.def: If you pledge something such as a valuable possession or a sum of money, you leave it with someone as a guarantee that you will repay money that you have borrowed.

example.ex: He asked her to pledge the house as security for a loan.
example.tran: 他要她拿房子来抵押贷款。

means.word_mean: 1. bound by or as if by an oath;

sentences.sentence: "according to an early tradition became his sworn brother"

auth_sentence.content: Some Republicans have already pledged to reject the plan.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some Republicans have already pledged to reject the plan.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some Republicans have already pledged to reject the plan.

auth_sentence.content: She has pledged to change the culture at Yahoo!
auth_sentence.res_content: She has pledged to change the culture at Yahoo!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She has pledged to change the culture at Yahoo!

auth_sentence.content: It's also pledged to improve training and equipment.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's also pledged to improve training and equipment.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's also pledged to improve training and equipment.
